sameAnalysis.part_name: 这组名词均含有"美德"之意。
means: goodness ： 含义最广，侧重固有的仁爱，慷慨等高尚的美德。
integrity ： 指品格的纯正，有高度是非感的美德。
morality ： 强调符合道德标准的行为或用道德准则衡量某事，尤注重男女间的道德品行。
purity ： 侧重于道德上无缺点。
virtue ： 一般用词，指符合道德准则的隐恶扬善行为或品行或指一种有意识去做善事的高尚道德。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示"优点，长处"之意。
means: merit ： 指有值得赞扬的优点，但不一定是出类拔萃。
virtue ： 指人或物的优点长处，指人的美德。
pefection ： 指达到了理想或完美的程度。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

sentence.Network_en: She could have established her own innocence and virtue easily enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 她本可以轻易地证实自己纯真善良的品性。

sentence.Network_en: Its other great virtue, of course, is its hard-wearing quality.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的另一个突出优点当然就是经久耐用。

大学英语四级考试大纲(V)|英语四级词汇 ... violin n. 小提琴 virtue n. 善；美德；优点 visible a. 可见的，看得见的.
高中必背3500词汇表听写版 - 豆丁网 ... violinist n. 提琴家，提琴手 virtue n. 美德,正直的品行,德行 virus n. 病毒.
「德性」(virtue)一词在道德思想史上颇受争议。其确切定义、种类，及跟道德经验中其他因素之间的关系等问题，都是争论的焦点。

list.abs: 德性伦理学( virtue ethics) ① 已经经历了50年的发展历程。它堪称当代英美伦理研究中最强劲的一股力量, 其复兴不仅开辟了自身独立 …
这些东西统称为公民美德（civic virtue），因为它们明确了构成“好公民”的道德内容。最早的契约论思想就蕴含了何为恰当行为的思想。
《水性杨花（Easy virtue）》原声带已发送，请注意查收~O(∩_∩)O提问者对回答的评价： 感谢，非常感谢，额外追加30分2012-2-14 …
All times and in all honesty is a virtue ., 古今中外 , 诚实都是一种美德.

jx.jx_en_mean: because or as a result of
derive benefit or advantage from submitting to (an unwelcome obligation or unavoidable circumstance)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 将（不乐意的事）变成有利的

jx.jx_en_mean: On the grounds or basis of; by reason of

lj.lj_ly: well off by virtue of a large inheritance.
lj.lj_ls: 由于继承了大笔遗产而致富

phrase.cizu_name: by virtue of 或 in virtue of

means.word_mean: 道德,正直,名誉,高尚,公正,忠诚,美德

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French vertu, from Latin virtus 'valour, merit, moral perfection', from vir 'man'

entry.tran: 善行;正直的品性;良好的习惯
entry.def: Virtue is thinking and doing what is right and avoiding what is wrong.

example.ex: Virtue is not confined to the Christian world...
example.tran: 善行并不是仅限于基督教世界。

example.ex: She could have established her own innocence and virtue easily enough.
example.tran: 她本可以轻易地证实自己纯真善良的品性。

entry.def: A virtue is a good quality or way of behaving.

example.ex: Her flaws were as large as her virtues...
example.tran: 她的缺点和优点一样多。

entry.def: The virtue of something is an advantage or benefit that it has, especially in comparison with something else.

example.ex: There was no virtue in returning to Calvi the way I had come...
example.tran: 沿着我来的路线返回卡尔维并不可取。

example.ex: Its other great virtue, of course, is its hard-wearing quality.
example.tran: 它的另一个突出优点当然就是经久耐用。

entry.def: You use by virtue of to explain why something happens or is true.

example.ex: The article stuck in my mind by virtue of one detail...
example.tran: 由于一个细节，这篇文章在我脑海里印象深刻。

example.ex: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
example.tran: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

entry.tran: （假装）心甘情愿地做（迫不得已的事）
entry.def: If you make a virtue of something, you pretend that you did it because you chose to, although in fact you did it because you had to.

example.ex: The movie makes a virtue out of its economy.
example.tran: 这部电影充分利用了其有限的成本。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of doing what is right and avoiding what is wrong
3. morality with respect to sexual relations

vir男人+ago→像男人一样的妇人

virtue德行,美德;贞操;优点+os+o人→技能之人→大师

means.word_mean: 美德, 优秀品质，良好习惯，德行，高尚的道德，正直的品性

sentences.en: Among her many virtues are loyalty, courage, and truthfulness.
sentences.cn: 她有许多的美德, 如忠诚、勇敢和诚实。

sentences.en: The chair has the virtue of being adjustable.
sentences.cn: 这种椅子具有可调节的优点。

jushi.english: He has the virtue of being a good listener.
jushi.chinese: 他有虚心听取意见的优点。
